page.title: 12HOUSING IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: MOST OF THE YOUNGER CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL LIVE IN{MODERN DETACHED HOUSES. A COUPLE LIVE ON FARMS.ONE LIVES IN AN {OLD TERRACED HOUSE}AND ANOTHER IN AN {OLD SEMI-DETACHED.}ONE BOY LIVES IN A {BUNGALOW. SOME OF THE HOUSES HAVE TWO BATHROOMS AND 5 BEDROOMS.MOST POPULAR IS THE 1 BATHROOMED,4 BEDROOMED HOUSE.ONE CHILD LIVES IN A 3 BEDROOMED HOUSE. THE MAJORITY OF HOUSES IN THE VILLAGE ARE{20 YEARS OLD}OR LESS.ONLY 3 HOUSES STILL HAVE A{COAL}FIRE.THE MAJORITY HAVE EITHER A{GAS}OR AN {ELECTRIC FIRE}AND A FEW HAVE NO FIRE AT ALL.EVERY HOUSE HOWEVER HAS SOME FORM OF{CENTRAL HEATING. ALL THE HOUSES HAVE A GARDEN,MOST WITH ONE AT THE BACK AND THE FRONT.FIVE OF THE CHILDREN HAVE {CARAVANS.
